snippet.title: Sumo - KFG Showcase Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
As seen in the KindaFunnyGames Showcase - 

Sumo is an all ages, local and online multiplayer, physics-based party game for up to 4 players, featuring adorable spherical characters with unique powerful abilities, brought to you by new Indie developer Table 9 Studio.  Play on Early Access on Steam today!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/858960/Sumo/

Use a combination of mobility, tactics, and your character's special ability to navigate a deceptively harsh environment, for in Sumo, the Arenas are just as much of a threat as your human or AI-controlled opponents.  You have only one objective - Be the last sphere standing.

Each Arena in Sumo offers creative ways to send your opponents careening off the edge. But beware, all Arenas continuously collapse, leaving only one player victorious. 

Early Access now available - https://store.steampowered.com/app/858960/Sumo/


Music Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4 International License.
* Title: Drums of Fury
* Composer: Alexander Hoff 
* Youtube Channel: https://goo.gl/9AGRKd
